body: Hi Mostapha, Chris and group members, I made a little experiment about a small house by adaptive comfort method to check the influence to interior comfort by different passive operations, such as natural ventilation. The result seemed odd that showed great approximately 50% increase in interior comfort after natural ventilation, even the winter time turned warm inside the house.  That was incomprehensible to me. So I am wondering whether my gh file setting was not correct, or could anyone help me to explain it?  Thank you very much.[](http://api.ning.com:80/files/gCx7TixaLiNkvtBU4sXGS8S9hAtRahtG32A52LVESMaIDNdwva8RwU0dp8kkQwf6K*2tzCmZYsxqRaHcie*lgy*R5fIRKPYS/11111111111111111111111111.png)
topic: Problems about the Adaptive Comfort Accuracy
